name: Eggstravagander
description:
A retro-classic defend-the-nest top-down goose egg-protection game. Honk at swans as they steer recklessly towards your nest, blast away mallards and coots with your powerful goose noises.

How long will you survive as the onslaught of waterfowl intensifies?

Eggs will first crack, then break. Once all your eggs are gone - that's it!

Mute music to reduce audio lag - or download the .exe file
